data.meta_description: Title: Billing and Cash Management Compliance & Audit Risks Description: Discission of Billing and Cash Management hot topics, compliance, audit risks…
data.text:
Title: Billing and Cash Management Compliance & Audit Risks

Description: Discission of Billing and Cash Management hot topics, compliance, audit risks, and reporting to help navigate questions and challenging situations. Highlight of non-standard sponsor requirements related to invoicing, and how NU-RES Finance and College RAs can collaborate to meet sponsor requirements.

Presenters:

– Sami Reed – Cash Accountant, NU-RES

– Kalina Mathurin – Director, Research Accounting, NU-RES
